ear.name: ear
ear.transformationDescription:
The hot itching feeling passes after a few moments, leaving [npc.herHim] with delicate, scaly ears, with long, pointed tips.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] [style.boldSnake(pointed snake-ears)], which are [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.earFullDescription].
ear.bodyDescription: [npc.She] [npc.has] a pair of pointed snake ears, which are [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.earFullDescription(true)]#IF(npc.isPiercedEar()), and which have been pierced#ENDIF. #IF(npc.getFaceType()==FACE_TYPE_HUMAN) Small patches of scales extend from the base of [npc.her] ears down onto [npc.her] cheeks. #ENDIF
